Chinese.name: CKAFKA数据备份MySQL
Chinese.description: 本示例会使用Ckafka触发器，将消息转储至MySQL。
Chinese.attention: 在使用本示例代码时需要传递相关函数的环境变量。

English.name: CkafkaBackupToCDBMySQL
English.description: This example consumes Kafka to the CDB MySQL.
English.attention: When using this sample code, you need to pass the environment variables of related functions.
